name: Project Eris - Demo
description:
CHALLENGING ENCOUNTERS. Levels will require a keen eye to solve puzzles, unique bosses and enemies will keep you on your feet throughout battle.

REWARDS. Earn rare and powerful rewards for your feats. Use your rewards to enhance the way you play and take on greater challenges. 

PLAY YOUR WAY. Choose abilities and skills, prioritize stats, collect an array of items to personalize the way you combat the unknown. 

Equip your abilities and test your mettle. Enhance and customize your skills to wager the fight in your favour. Progressing though levels will cause you to encounter unique bosses that turn the tide of battle with every phase. Be meticulous and use your environment to your advantage. With hundreds of ways to slay the unknown, do it with finesse. Use items dropped from combatants and found throughout gameplay to enhance your character and tackle greater challenges.
